byline.original: By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Ital and German press blames Jews for USSR moves
snippet: ROME, July 1--This is a period of lull before the storm that will come when the Axis powers attack Britain. It is believed that the Balkan flank now is well protected, despite clashes on the Hungarian frontier....

headline.main: BALKAN FLANK SAFE, THE ITALIANS BELIEVE; Rumanian Tension Held Eased by Anti-Jewish Campaign

lead_paragraph: ROME, July 1--This is a period of lull before the storm that will come when the Axis powers attack Britain. It is believed that the Balkan flank now is well protected, despite clashes on the Hungarian frontier.
